segments.text: I see the girl reaching up, hoping to get a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so excited, like she’s about to get a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both going to be in trouble if the woman turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just spilling everywhere, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the woman, she’s going to have a big cleanup later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos in here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everyone is acting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR
